items.summary: Add the uploaded image (ChatGPT Image Feb 16, 2026, 11_49_14 AM.png) to the frontend as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` so it can be referenced by the Services page.

Update the selected Services page section at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]` (the Hero Section in `frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx`) to use the uploaded image as a full-bleed background with responsive `cover` behavior, centered positioning, and a dark dimmed overlay layer behind the existing text to ensure readability; do not change any hero copy.
